name: Block Puzzle Jigsaw
description:
Block Puzzle Jigsaw is a simple but addictive puzzle game.

The goal is to drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally. Don't forget to keep the blocks from filling the screen in this addictive puzzle game.

Block Puzzle Jigsaw Features:
• Classic block puzzle
• Simple but fun
• ios free download
• Support global rank boards

How to play:
- Drag the block onto the pad
- Try to put them all in rows or columns
- The more block you eliminate at once, the higher scores you will get
- If the grid cannot put the new block below, the game will end
- color block can not be rotated

You can play anytime, anywhere! We really hope you like it!
Let's try the game now!
